titleStmt.title: Proposals humbly offer'd to the honourable House of Commons. For the taking off the excise of beer and ale, and the settling a better revenue upon the crown, in lieu of the Court of Wards and Liveries, by a burthen insensible, or inconsiderable; but will very much enrich the kingdom in general, and at all times will be a good fond to borrow a million of money.
titleStmt.author: Great Britain. Parliament. House of Commons.

titleStmt.title: Proposals humbly offer'd to the honourable House of Commons. For the taking off the excise of beer and ale, and the settling a better revenue upon the crown, in lieu of the Court of Wards and Liveries, by a burthen insensible, or inconsiderable; but will very much enrich the kingdom in general, and at all times will be a good fond to borrow a million of money.
titleStmt.author: Great Britain. Parliament. House of Commons.
